item.title: Millstream Brau Haus Halloween Party
item.description: Grab your costumes and head out to the Millstream Brau Haus in Amana, IA featuring the music of the Compass Rose Band! Great food, drinks, and atmosphere in the old authentic German Bierhalle. No cover charge.

item.title: Friday Night Live With Compass Rose
item.description: Come out to Cedar Ridge Winery and Distillery for the debut there of the Compass Rose Band. Enjoy the wine and spirits while singing and dancing to the classic/country rock music of Compass Rose. No cover charge or reservations taken. No outside food or drink permitted. Cedar Ridge wine & spirits, Iowa beer, soft drinks, wood-fired pizzas and small plates available for purchase.

item.title: DanceMor Ballroom
item.description: We're headed back to the Iowa Rock & Roll Hall of Fame venue, DanceMor Ballroom. We had such a great time playing at our debut, we're gonna do it again. Tickets are $8.00 in advance or $10.00 at the door.

item.title: Bobbers Grill
item.description: Join us at one of our very favorite places to play, Bobbers Grill at the Scales Pointe Campground in North Liberty, IA! Great food & drinks mixed by the best bartenders, awesome staff and a great location on the banks of Coralville Lake. Camping is available, so you can stay and party!

item.title: DanceMor Ballroom
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we debut at the historic, Iowa Rock and Roll Hall of Fame venue, Dancemor Ballroom! Opening for us is the 3pc country band Palomino, 6-8pm. Tickets are $8.00 in advance, $10.00 at the door.

item.title: Wild Hogs Saloon
item.description: We've had a lot of fun and made a lot of friends playing at Wild Hogs Saloon in Walford, IA, so we're excited to announce that we will be performing there once a month! We will play on the 1st Monday of every month, starting on March 4th. We will still perform there occasionally on the weekends, too. If you want to keep the weekend going or just want to cut loose after that dreadful Monday back-to-work, come out and party with us at Wild Hogs Saloon from 5:00 - 9:00 pm on the 1st Monday of every month!

item.title: Wild Hogs Saloon
item.description: Join us for a special Sunday performance at one of our very favorite places to play! Great food & Drinks, awesome staff and one of the biggest dance floors around! Let's Party!!!

item.title: Bully's Angle Inn
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we rock out Bully's Angle Inn for the 1st time! Great food, drinks & atmosphere! No cover!

item.description: Free concert! Great food and drinks, awesome staff and the biggest dance floor around!

item.title: Island Fever Showcase
item.description: The Compass Rose Band plays from 12:00pm - 1:30pm.

item.title: Bobbers Grill with the Compass Rose Band
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we play inside Bobbers Grill for the 1st time. Dogs On Skis plays Saturday outside on the patio, so come early and stay the weekend at Scales Pointe Campground!

item.title: Wilton Founders Day Celebration
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we return for the 38th Annual Wilton Founders Day Celebration. There will be carnival rides on the midway, food vendors, a street dance by the beer tent and much more! Plenty of fun for the whole family! Check out www.wiltoniowa.org for complete details!

item.title: Wild Hogs Saloon
item.description: Come out and join the Compass Rose Band as we return to one of our favorite venues! Great food, great staff, and one of the biggest dance floors around! LET'S GET WILD!!!!

item.title: North English Fun Days
item.description: Free concert in the park with the Compass Rose Band. Fireworks show included!

item.title: Private Pool Party
item.description: One of the best parties of the summer!!!

item.title: Newbo Rock the Block
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we return to the Newbo City Market to Rock the Block! Opening for the CRB at 5:30pm will be the Country Band. Bring your lawn chairs (no coolers please) for a free concert on the grounds of the Newbo City Market. Plenty of food and drink vendors will be available on-site.

item.title: 4th of July Block Party
item.description: Please bring your own food, drink, and chairs. Parking is available on A Avenue or in the Marion High School Parking lot.

item.title: JR and Laurieloo's Party on the Patio
item.description: We had so much fun at this year's Party on the Patio that we decided to make it an annual event. A $10 donation would be appreciated to help cover the cost of the band. Bring your lawn chairs, coolers and a snack to share for the potluck. Spread the word and let's make this Party on the Patio even better than 2017!

item.title: Fireside Winery
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we return to the beautiful and intimate setting of the Fireside Winery in Marengo, Iowa. Choose one or more of the many great varieties of Fireside wines and settle in next to one of the fire pits next to the outdoor stage for an evening of great music under the stars!

item.title: Bobbers Grill
item.description: Come on out and Rock the Patio with the Compass Rose Band at one of our favorite venues, Bobbers Grill at the Scales Pointe Campground on the Coralville Reservoir. Great food and drinks and the best bartenders and staff! Reserve your campsite now and spend the whole weekend with us!

item.title: Bobbers Grill
item.description: Come on out and Rock the Patio with the Compass Rose Band at one of our favorite venues, Bobbers Grill at Scales Pointe Campground on the Coralville Reservoir. Great food and drinks, and the best bartenders and staff! Book your campsite now and spend the whole weekend with us!

item.title: Wild Hogs
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we return to the Wild Hogs stage to kick off the Super Bowl weekend! Wild Hogs has great food & drinks, awesome staff and one of the biggest dance floors in the area. Let's Party!!!!

item.title: New Year's Eve Bash
item.description: Join us as we bring in the new year with a bang!

item.title: Marion Ballroom Dance Class Christmas Party
Throttle Down Sports Bar
item.description: Come and party with us at the venue we will be playing at on New Year's Eve!

item.title: Q Casino
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band for a free concert in the showroom of the Q Casino in Dubuque, Iowa! We play from 8:00pm to Midnight. Hope to see you there!!!

item.title: Meskwaki Hotel and Casino
item.description: Come out to the Meskwaki Hotel and Casino lounge for a free show with The Compass Rose Band. We play Friday and Saturday nights from 8:30 - 1:00am.

item.title: Meskwaki Hotel and Casino
item.description: Come out to the Meskwaki Hotel and Casino Lounge for a free show with The Compass Rose Band. We play Friday and Saturday nights from 8:30pm - 1:00am. Get a room and join us both nights!

item.title: Wilton 37th Annual Founders Day Celebration
item.description: A two day celebration of the founding of Wilton, Iowa featuring the Eager Beaver Run, Cornhole Tournament, Carnival, Bingo, Car Show, Parade, and more! Music on Friday, the 25th will be Buddy Olson from 5-7 and the Compass Rose Band from 8 - midnight. Music on Satuday is the Saloonatics from 8 - midnight. For more info go to www.wiltoniowa.org.

item.title: Marion Uptown Getdown
item.description: The Compass Rose Band returns to Marion Square Park for a free concert. Bring your coolers and chairs, but please leave your pets at home.

item.title: Bobbers Grill
item.description: Join us for another great weekend on the patio at Bobbers Grill, overlooking the lake. Great food, drinks, and music! Camping is available on-site, so you don't have to worry about driving home. It doesn't get any better than this!!!

item.title: Private Pool Party
item.description: Birthday Bash for Doug Rassler.

item.title: Bobbers Grill
item.description: Join us on the Bobbers Grill patio, overlooking the lake. Great food, drinks, and music. Camping is available on-site too, so you don't have to worry about driving home. It doesn't get any better than this!!!

item.title: Millstream Brewery
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band for a streetfest at Iowa's oldest microbrewery, Millstream Brewery, in the world famous Amana Colonies. Bring your friends to taste some of the finest microbrews around and dance like no one is watching!

item.title: House Concert
item.description: An intimate concert at the home of JR & Laurieloo. A $10.00 per person donation would be appreciated to cover the cost of the band. A potluck dinner is included, so please bring a dish or snack to share. Also, bring your coolers and lawn chairs for a special evening with the Compass Rose Band. 7900 Wildwood Ln. Toddville, IA

item.title: FREDSTOCK
item.description: A free house concert featuring multiple bands and musicians. More details to follow!

item.title: Cedar Rapids Corvette Club Car Show
item.description: The Compass Rose Band will perform from 12:00pm - 2:30pm during the car show. Free admission. More details to follow at www.cedarrapidscorvetteclub.com.

item.title: Rock the Block
item.description: Join The Compass Rose Band for a free show at the Newbo City Market outdoor stage for their “Rock The Block” summer concert series. Bring your lawn chairs for a evening of great music and friendship!

item.title: Private Party
item.description: Black and Gold Study Group, end of the year party.

item.title: Meskwaki Hotel and Casino
item.description: Come out to the Meskwaki Hotel and Casino lounge for a free show with The Compass Rose Band! We are playing Friday and Saturday night from 8:30pm - 1:00am.

item.title: Meskwaki Hotel and Casino
item.description: Come out to the Meskwaki Hotel and Casino lounge for a free show with The Compass Rose Band! We are playing Friday and Saturday night from 8:30pm - 1:00am. Get a room and join us both nights!

item.description: Free show in the lounge.

item.title: Marion Uptown Getdown
item.description: Join The Compass Rose Band for a free concert in the park. Folding chairs and coolers allowed. please leave your pets at home. Food vendors will be on site selling various types of food and drink.

item.title: Jimmy Buffett Night at the Cedar Rapids Kernels
Music in the Park 2016
item.description: Free live music in the park at the Brown Pavilion.

item.title: Private Party
item.description: This event is closed to the public. It is an appreciation party for the employees of the Marengo Memorial Hospital.

item.title: Take Me Back Festival
item.description: Take Me Back Festival June 10th & 11th, 2016. Take Me Back Festival offers superb live entertainment. Proceeds go towards local charities. Friday at the Surf Ballroom: Johnny Holmes Band 7-11pm. Admission: $20.00 Saturday at PM Park/Clear Lake Tiki Bar: Hold On Band 2-5pm, The Compass Rose Band 5-8pm, Milk and Honey 8-11pm. Admission: $5.00

item.title: Marion Ballroom Dance Party
item.description: Join us with the Marion Ballroom Dance Class as we celebrate a night of music and dance. Admission is $45/couple for members and $55/couple for non-members, which includes food & drinks. We will feature sambas, rhumbas, waltzes, & good old rock & roll!

item.title: Compass Rose Duo Sunday Funday
item.description: Following Saturday nights St. MinneSomePlace “This Hotel Room” phlocking, join Doug & Bob from The Compass Rose Band for an afternoon of songs you won't hear with the full band. This will be a Funday with great phriends!!!

item.title: This Hotel Room Suite 21 Phlocking
item.description: The annual two day fundraiser for the St. MinneSomePlace Parrot Head Club featuring entertainment by Jambo Joe Bones, Jim Hoehn, Mary Cutrufello, and The Compass Rose Band. For tickets, hotel, and all other details of the event, go to www.st-minnesomeplace.com/this-hotel-room--thr--party.html.

item.title: Meskwaki Casino
item.description: Free show in the lounge.

item.title: Meskwaki Casino
item.description: Free show in the lounge.

item.title: Buffett Bash 2015
item.description: The Shake the Lake/Buffett Bash 2015 will include camping this year at the Walworth County Fairgrounds in Elkhorn, WI. and the Compass Rose Band will be entertaining the campers from 4pm to 8pm. This show is free for the campers and only $5.00 for non-campers, only $5.00 for non-campers. For all of the details for this four day event, go to http://www.two-seasons-bowl.com/buffett_bash.

item.title: Jimmy Buffett Night at the Cedar Rapids Kernels
Clear Lake Tiki Bar 2
item.description: The Compass Rose Band returns to the Clear Lake Tiki Bar for another fun night of music by the lake. Restaurant & lodging are available on site. For details, go to www.pmpark.org.

item.title: Bobbers Grill
item.description: Open to the public. No cover charge. Camping available at Scales Point Marina.

item.title: Clear Lake Tiki Bar
item.description: Join The Compass Rose Band live on the shore of Clear Lake at the Clear Lake Tiki Bar. We will be playing all of our fun tropical tunes and celebrating the birthday of our lead singer, Doug Rassler! Join us for a great evening of fun and laughter by the lake at this great bar. No Cover Charge!

item.title: Riverside Casino
item.description: We will be in the show lounge. No cover charge

item.title: Quad City Parrot Head Club Golf Outing Post Party
item.description: Register for both Golfing and post party or just the post party with The Compass Rose Band. Click on the link for registration and details.

item.title: Cedar River Landing
item.description: Come out and party with The Compass Rose Band at one of Cedar Rapids best venues for LIVE MUSIC! And as always, NO COVER CHARGE!

item.title: Rich Abernethy Hot Tub/Pool Birthday Party
item.description: Come out and help celebrate Rich's birthday! Pool & hot tub will be heated. We will play inside in the event of bad weather.

item.title: Oskaloosa Fundraiser
item.description: More details to follow!

item.title: Wild Hogs Cabin Fever Party
item.description: We have the cure for your case of Cabin Fever! A tropical party at Wild Hogs Saloon with The Compass Rose Band will warm you right up. A few shots of Fireball with the band will help too!!!

item.title: Rubies Bar Birthday Party for Coach
item.description: This is a birthday party for Coach.

item.title: House of Harley - Milwaukee Winter Beach Party
item.description: Join The Compass Rose Band as part of a two day Winter Beach Party at the House of Harley in Milwaukee, WI. Lots of music, drinks, specials and give-aways including a trip for two to the Maya Riviera!

item.title: The Compass Rose Band at Rubies Bar
item.description: This is the last weekend to be naughty or nice before Santa comes. Which will you be???

item.title: St. MinneSomePlace 20th Annual Holiday and Membership Appreciation (HAMA) Party
The Compass Rose Band at The Red Baron
item.description: Work off that Thanksgiving dinner by dancing the night away with The CRB. No Cover Charge!!!

item.title: Otis' Tailgators Post Game Party
item.description: Help us celebrate the win over the Purdue Boilermakers!

item.title: Shake the Lake Music Festival
item.description: This is an inaugural musical event that will be held the last weekend in August every year. This year starts off on Friday, the 22nd at 6:00pm with The Compass Rose Band followed by the Boat Drunks at 8:00pm. Saturday continues with the band, Off the Record at 6:00pm followed by the Boat Drunks at 8:00pm. Then Sunday, the fun continues with The Compass Rose Band at noon followed by the Boat Drunks with special guest from the Coral Reefer Band, Nadirah Shakoor at 2:30pm.

item.title: Alpine Valley Music Theatre VIP Club for Jimmy Buffet Concert
item.description: We will play before and after Jimmy Buffett's concert. You must have a VIP pass to attend this show.

item.title: Shake the Lake Music Festival
item.description: This is an inaugural musical event that will be held the last weekend in August every year. This year starts off on Friday, the 22nd at 6:00pm with The Compass Rose Band followed by the Boat Drunks at 8:00pm. Saturday continues with the band, Off the Record at 6:00pm followed by the Boat Drunks at 8:00pm. Then Sunday, the fun continues with The Compass Rose Band at noon followed by the Boat Drunks with special guest from the Coral Reefer Band, Nadirah Shakoor at 2:30pm.

item.title: Jimmy Buffet Night at the Cedar Rapids Kernels
item.description: Concert begins immediately following the game.

item.title: Isle of Iowa Parrot Head Club 17th Birthday Party
The Mississippi Moon Bar
item.description: Come out and join us for the debut of The Compass Rose Band. No cover charge!
